title: Bug 18934 - Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around, but they don't have any effect. This is particularly noticeable when opening a small image, such as an icon. The scrollbars are misleading because they don't do anything.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved but have no effect.
SR:
1. Open Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they have no effect.
4. Open a small image, such as an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading because they don't do anything.
